welcomeDescription: Before you begin, please configure the database connection
supabaseDescription: Cloud database, no backend service required, generous free tier, suitable for individuals and small teams.
mysqlDescription: Self-hosted database, requires backend proxy deployment, suitable for users with development experience.
noSupabaseProject: Don't have a Supabase project yet?
supabaseStep2: After creating a new project, go to Settings → API
supabaseStep3: Copy the Project URL and anon key
initSchemaDescription: For first-time use, please execute the initialization script in Supabase Dashboard → SQL Editor
configSavedSuccess: Configuration saved, you can start using now!
mysqlBackendDescription: Please refer to the code in the server/ directory to deploy the backend proxy service. If you don't have backend development experience, Supabase is recommended.
mysqlInitNote: First-time MySQL users need to initialize the schema. If tables already exist, this operation will not affect existing data.
configSavedLocally: Configuration will be saved in browser local storage
fillSupabaseConfig: Please fill in the complete Supabase configuration
fillMySQLConfig: Please fill in the complete MySQL configuration
testConnectionFirst: Please test the connection successfully before initializing the schema
schemaAlreadyLatest: Schema is already up to date
